articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle’s early access period won’t include full ray tracing - The Verge
articles.description: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle won’t get full ray tracing until December 9th, meaning early access PC players initially won’t be able to use the feature.
articles.content:
Indiana Jones and the Great Circles early access period wont include full ray tracing
